ctx: intros l i e H_sorted H_in H_eIndex.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros l i e H_sorted H_in H_eIndex.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros l i e H_sorted H_in H_eIndex. induction l as [|e' l' IHl]. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. destruct H_sorted as [H_order H_sorted]. destruct H_in as [Heq | Hin]. + subst. simpl in H_eIndex. inversion H_eIndex. subst. apply H_order. + apply IHl; try apply H_sorted. * simpl in H_order. split. ++ intros e'' Hin'. apply H_order. right. apply Hin'. ++ apply H_order. * apply removeAfterIndex_sorted. apply H_sorted. * apply removeAfterIndex_in. right. apply H_in.
